CustomField.formula: IF(SLA_Remaining__c > 0 || SLA_Remaining_Duration__c = 'Achieved within SLA' || ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'OTP Received'), IMAGE( "/resource/1655991777000/GraphicsPackNew/fatcow/farmfresh/16/flag_green.png", "Green"), IMAGE( "/resource/1655991777000/GraphicsPackNew/fatcow/farmfresh/16/flag_red.png", "Red") )
CustomField.label: SLA Flag
